# tf.compat.v1.flags.DEFINE_string


<table class="tfo-notebook-buttons tfo-api" align="left">
</table>



Registers a flag whose value can be any string.

### Aliases:

* `tf.compat.v1.app.flags.DEFINE_string`


``` python
tf.compat.v1.flags.DEFINE_string(
    name,
    default,
    help,
    flag_values=_flagvalues.FLAGS,
    **args
)
```
